item.title: MongoDB 스터디 1주차(MongoDB 기초)
item.description: MongoDB란? A database A NoSQL Database row, column 이 없음 NoSQL documentDB Stored in collections MongoDB는 NoSQL Document Database 입니다. Document와 Collection? Document: A way to organize and store data as a set of field-value pairs { "name" : "hueypark", "title" : "software engineer" } Collection: An ogranized store of documents in MongoDB, usually with common fields between documents Atlas의 놀라운 프리티어 정책 3-server replica set 512MB storage Never expires mongo "mongodb+srv://sandbox.
